com.opera.core.systems

Class OperaProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opera.core.systems.OperaProxy

  • public class OperaProxy
extends Object
    Representation of Opera's internal proxy configuration. Don't use this interface directly, but consider using Selenium's Proxy instead.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OperaProxy(OperaDriver parent)

    • Method Detail

      • getHttpProxy

        public String getHttpProxy()
        Gets the HTTP proxy.
        Returns:
        the HTTP proxy hostname if present, or null if not set

      • setHttpProxy

        public void setHttpProxy(String host)
        Specify which proxy to use for HTTP connections.
        Parameters:
        host - the proxy host, expected format is hostname:1234

      • getHttpsProxy

        public String getHttpsProxy()
        Gets the HTTPS proxy.
        Returns:
        the HTTPS proxy hostname if present, or null if not set

      • setHttpsProxy

        public void setHttpsProxy(String host)
        Specify which proxy to use for HTTPS connections.
        Parameters:
        host - the proxy host, expected format is hostname:1234

      • getFtpProxy

        public String getFtpProxy()
        Gets the FTP proxy.
        Returns:
        the FTP proxy hostname if present, or null if not set

      • setFtpProxy

        public void setFtpProxy(String host)
        Specify which proxy to use for FTP connections.
        Parameters:
        host - the proxy host, expected format is hostname:1234

      • getSocksProxy

        public String getSocksProxy()
        Gets the SOCKS proxy.
        Returns:
        the SOCKS proxy if present, null otherwise

      • setSocksProxy

        public void setSocksProxy(String host)
        Specifies which proxy to use for SOCKS. Currently only supported in OperaDriver.
        Parameters:
        host - the proxy host, expected format is hostname.com:1234

      • getSocksUsername

        public String getSocksUsername()
        Gets the SOCKS proxy's username. Supported by SOCKS v5 and above.
        Returns:
        the SOCKS proxy's username

      • setSocksUsername

        public void setSocksUsername(String username)
        Specifies a username for the SOCKS proxy. Supported by SOCKS v5 and above.
        Parameters:
        username - username for the SOCKS proxy

      • getSocksPassword

        public String getSocksPassword()
        Gets the SOCKS proxy's password. Supported by SOCKS v5 and above.
        Returns:
        the SOCKS proxy's password

      • setSocksPassword

        public void setSocksPassword(String password)
        Specifies a password for the SOCKS proxy. Supported by SOCKS v5 and above.
        Parameters:
        password - password for the SOCKS proxy

      • isProxyLocal

        public boolean isProxyLocal()
        Whether to proxy local resources. Is disabled by default.
        Returns:
        true if to proxy local resources, false otherwise

      • setProxyLocal

        public void setProxyLocal(boolean proxyLocalServers)
        Enable or disable proxy of local resources. By default it is disabled.
        Parameters:
        proxyLocalServers - true to enable of proxy local resources, false to disable

      • getAutoconfigUrl

        public String getAutoconfigUrl()
        Get the URL of the automatic proxy configuration file.
        Returns:
        URL to proxy configuration file

      • setAutoconfigUrl

        public void setAutoconfigUrl(String url)
        Specify the automatic proxy configuration file as a URL.
        Parameters:
        url - url to the automatic proxy configuration file

      • isUsePAC

        public boolean isUsePAC()
        Whether this proxy uses PAC, short for Proxy Auto Configuration.
        Returns:
        true if PAC is in use, false otherwise

      • setUsePAC

        public void setUsePAC(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable PAC, short for Proxy Auto Configuration.
        Parameters:
        enabled - set to true to enable, false to disable

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Whether proxy is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if proxy is enabled, false otherwise

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable proxy.
        Parameters:
        enabled - set to true to enable, false to disable

      • parse

        public void parse(org.openqa.selenium.Proxy proxy)
        Parse an instance of Proxy, merge and apply its configuration to the current Opera instance.
